law.catch_line: In any cause of action affecting the common property, rights, and liabilities of an unincorporated a...
law.text: In any cause of action affecting the common property, rights, and liabilities of an unincorporated association, joint stock company, or other group which has a recognized group name, a money judgment against the group is enforceable only against the assets of the group as an entity, but not against the assets of any member.
